${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:Outspeed.NAME: Outspeed
${modID}:Outspeed.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Block is not removed at the start of your next !M! turns.

${modID}:Bite.NAME: Bite
${modID}:Bite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! additional cards at the start of your next turn.

${modID}:PleaseThisIsNotABarFight.NAME: Please, This Isn't A Bar Fight
${modID}:PleaseThisIsNotABarFight.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Put a *Or Maybe It Is...* into your discard pile. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:PleaseThisIsNotABarFight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Put a *Or Maybe It Is...+* into your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:OrMaybeItIs.NAME: Or Maybe It Is...
${modID}:OrMaybeItIs.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Put a *Please, This Isn't A Bar Fight* into your discard pile. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:OrMaybeItIs.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Put a *Please, This Isn't A Bar Fight+* into your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ICanDoSomethingForYou.NAME: I'm Sure I Can Do Something For You
